column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=After a very tough workout with some friend 's at the gym , I was very sore and wanted to take a bath to help my soreness and get clean .
#text=I remembered that mom bought me something to put inside of the bath that helped soothe sore muscles .
#text=I grabbed it from the cabinet and turned the water on to very hot .
#text=After about 3 minutes , the tub was full and I poured some of the mixture in it and it became very bubbly and smelled great .
#text=I slowly placed myself into the bathtub and lit a few candles to help me relax , as I had a very long day .
#text=After about 30 minutes of soaking in the very warm water , I got out of the tub , dried myself and then drained it .
#text=After it fully drained , I ran some more water in order to fully rinse all of the soap mixture down the drain , leaving a very clean tub .
#text=After this , I changed into comfortable clothes and enjoyed my evening .
